text: Amasung Jisuna khunggangsing, saharsing amadi apikpa khunsingda chatpa mapham khudingmakta miyamna makhoigi anaba misingbu keithelsingda puthoraklammi, aduga anabasingbu Ibungogi phiji aduta sok-hanbiyu haina makhoina Ibungoda haijarammi. Aduga Ibungogi phiji sokchaba makheina anaba phajarammi.
